page.title: 02STREET LIFE (a child's view)
page.content: Over the road from us the houses are being knocked down because they were only concrete and they would fall down in about a year. Before the houses got knocked down all the kids were smashing the windows and in one of the houses there was a carpet what had been left there and the kids set fire to it. Every time a car goes by in our street the dogs chase it. About 2 minutes away is Tick Tock Park where there are swings,slides and a metal van to play on. There is also a{shop}what sells sweets. Round the corner there is a{mobile shop}what sells bread,milk,hot pies and things. Down the road there is a{Fish and Chip {Shop}which got burgled. The burglars took their{Television,Video}and {Microwave}but they were insured so they bought new ones. Nearly every house on our street has been burgled.
